/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a comprehensive view of the scene below. The street is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings line the sides of the street, their facades adorned with vibrant advertisements that add a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape.
